mapper.select: select * from choose_projectname cp,sys_emp se,pt_meal pm where cp.mm_id=#{mmid} and cp.emp_id=se.emp_id and cp.choose_id= pm.pt_id

select * from member_meal mm inner join choose_projectname cp on mm.mm_id=cp.mm_id inner join pt_meal pm on cp.choose_id=pm.pt_id inner join pt_projectname pp on pp.ptp_id=cp.ptp_id inner join sys_emp se on se.emp_id=cp.emp_id where mm.meal_type="私教" and mm.member_id=#{memberId};
